citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40pm on
03-Oct-16.
APHIS VMO attempted to make contact via telephone numbers provided by Licensee and left a message. VMO
waited for 30 minutes before leaving the facility. Licensee has contacted APHIS VMO regarding optimal hours.
Additional Inspectors
Rhyner Aaron, Assistant Director
